Glad to hear that portal is in HL universe. Love it!
Excelente juego, tiene su tiempo pero sigue siendo unico y esta mucho mas desarrollado que el primero, un clasico que todos deberian jugar

Portal 2 is probably one of the best games i've ever played so far. This game is one of valve's giants and rightly so. Portal 2 is twice as good if you have a friend to play with in the new "Cooperative Testing Initiative" aka Co-op mode. I'm not very good at portal so the game took me 7 hours to complete but if you are a hardcore portal fan and somehow don't own this game yet it will probably take you around 3-4 hours. The story mode is amazing and has a mind blowing plot twist. (Not going to spoil it for you.) There is also a mode where you can design your own custom test chambers and upload them to the workshop for everyone to see and download, this feature alone adds countless hours of fun because when you beat story and co-op it gives you something to do! can I give this game a 9.5/10 for it's fantastic story telling, it's addictive gameplay and it's massive replay value!
My brain hurts trying to speedrun this game, nonetheless, was excecuted very well.
no hace falta leerse un toston de analisis, este es un juego con una jugabilidad y una historia espectacular y encima con las rebajas de verano con un precio ridiculo. RECOMENDADO 100%.

Great visuals, immersive world and an intriguing story. Thats just a summary though. The gameplay is crafted perfectly for the games purpose. The pacing of the story is good but you can get lost as to where you are if you havent played Portal 1.

Overall, great game.

An oldie but a goodie, I can't even notice it's 6 years old now.
Overall great game, I didn't own any puzzle games yet I've loved Portal probably since the day it was released and I finally decided to buy it. I wasn't disappointed.

Edit: After 30 hours of overall gameplay i have finished both the solo and coop campaign and beat all the "challenge mode" chamber speedrun times my friends have set.
Simplemente Valve. No es necesario ni que critique nada, es una maravilla, mires donde lo mires.Â¿Â¿ Ademas en las ofertas de steam por 2 euros?? Es un regalo.
Finiest pice of art ive everd played
